  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"CreateSequencingExperimentBatchBody represents the body required to create a sequencing experiment batch","properties":{"sequencing_experiments":{"items":{"properties":{"aliquot":{"type":"string"},"capture_kit":{"type":"string"},"experimental_strategy_code":{"enum":["wgs","wxs","rnaseq","targeted_dna"],"type":"string"},"platform_code":{"type":"string"},"run_alias":{"type":"string"},"run_date":{"example":"2023-10-01T00:00:00Z","format":"date-time","type":"string"},"sample_organization_code":{"type":"string"},"sequencing_lab_code":{"type":"string"},"sequencing_read_technology_code":{"enum":["short_read","long_read"],"type":"string"},"status_code":{"enum":["unknown","draft","revoke","completed","incomplete","submitted","in_progress"],"type":"string"},"submitter_sample_id":{"type":"string"}},"required":["aliquot","experimental_strategy_code","platform_code","sample_organization_code","sequencing_lab_code","sequencing_read_technology_code","status_code","submitter_sample_id"],"type":"object","title":"SequencingExperimentBatch"},"minItems":1,"type":"array","uniqueItems":false}},"required":["sequencing_experiments"],"type":"object","title":"CreateSequencingExperimentBatchBody"}}},"description":"Create Body","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
